title: Chicago And A Pair Of Counties Bring Lawsuit Against OxyContin Makers
teaser: Two California counties and the city of Chicago, hard hit by OxyContin addiction, are suing the drug's manufacturers. Reporter Emily Green says they're charging that the drug-makers have contributed to an epidemic of prescription drug abuse.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
